pkgmetadata.longdescription: Datasets for the 'canvasXpress' Package // Contains the prepared data that is needed for the 'shiny' application examples in the 'canvasXpress' package. This package also includes datasets used for automated 'testthat' tests. Scotto L, Narayan G, Nandula SV, Arias-Pulido H et al. (2008) doi:10.1002/gcc.20577. Davis S, Meltzer PS (2007) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btm254.
